about_the_game:
In Samurai Bushido tradition, "Iaijutsu" is the technique of quickly drawing your blade for lethal effect. Precision, patience and timing are key to this form. So too is it the key to besting your foes in this rooftop hopping action platformer. Play as the nameless ronin as you seek to liberate your clan from its corrupt usurpers. Your opponents will be tough and will block any careless attacks you may make, so pay close attention to their moves and choose when you draw your blade carefully.

- Journey through two levels featuring a variety of beautiful pixel art environments
- Encounter several combinations of enemies with varying abilities
- Face off one on one against two tough bosses
- Iaijutsu features an original soundtrack by samurai descendant Jeffrey Daijiro Taylor featuring two intense songs for Taiko drums.

Controls:
Move: A and D
Strike: J
Jump: Space
Dash Attack: Jump + Strike, use WASD to control direction of dash

content_descriptors.notes: This is sword fighting game with a fair amount of blood.

detailed_description:
In Samurai Bushido tradition, "Iaijutsu" is the technique of quickly drawing your blade for lethal effect. Precision, patience and timing are key to this form. So too is it the key to besting your foes in this rooftop hopping action platformer. Play as the nameless ronin as you seek to liberate your clan from its corrupt usurpers. Your opponents will be tough and will block any careless attacks you may make, so pay close attention to their moves and choose when you draw your blade carefully.

- Journey through two levels featuring a variety of beautiful pixel art environments
- Encounter several combinations of enemies with varying abilities
- Face off one on one against two tough bosses
- Iaijutsu features an original soundtrack by samurai descendant Jeffrey Daijiro Taylor featuring two intense songs for Taiko drums.

Controls:
Move: A and D
Strike: J
Jump: Space
Dash Attack: Jump + Strike, use WASD to control direction of dash

name: Iaijutsu

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft ® Windows ® 10
  • Processor: 1.2GHz processor (Intel Core i5 and up)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10, 11, or 12 compatible card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft ® Windows ® 10
  • Processor: Dual Core Intel 15 and above
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 77 series or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: In this retro action game, the player controls a mysterious ronin, navigating the rooftops and alleys of a rainy city as they are hunted by a team of elite assassins.
